sentences.english: Those on the receiving end exited the bloody bullring.
sentences.chinese: 在接收端那些退出了血腥的鬥牛場。

sentences.english: Besides, I really don't care for guys who stink like blood.
sentences.chinese: 並且，我果然對混身披髮着血腥氣的小子沒興趣。

sentences.english: The lure of the blood trade drew Durge away from his tribe and into the rest of the galaxy.
sentences.chinese: 血腥交易的誘惑把德奇拖離部族，帶向銀河別處。

sentences.english: The bloody attack drew condemnation from Israel's top political echelon.
sentences.chinese: 血腥的襲擊引起了以色列高級政治階層的譴責。

sentences.english: I tasted blood again, gingerly touched my split upper lip.
sentences.chinese: 輕舔開裂的上脣，我又嚐到血腥味。

sentences.english: Here is not allowed to post any Blood-and-thunder picture.
sentences.chinese: 嚴禁貼任何暴力血腥圖片。

sentences.english: Folks living in the town nearby called her Bloody Mary, and said she was a witch.
sentences.chinese: 附近村子裏的人說她是個女巫，叫她血腥馬莉。

sentences.english: Pols recommends "The Wrestler, " blood and all, as a date movie.
sentences.chinese: Pols推薦血腥的《摔跤手》作爲約會電影。

sentences.english: These bloody trials have been the historical event what we call witch-hunt.
sentences.chinese: 這些血腥的審判構成了被我們稱之爲獵巫的歷史事件。

sentences.english: Will things get bloodier if the indictment goes ahead?
sentences.chinese: 如果法庭提起起訴，情況會不會變得更加血腥？

sentences.english: The Iranian response was delayed by the presidential elections in June and their bloody aftermath.
sentences.chinese: 伊朗六月的總統選舉以及血腥的餘波拖延了其迴應。

sentences.english: The bloodshed, the relentless battles had finally brought him here.
sentences.chinese: 在血腥的殛斃和無情的撻伐中，他踏屍前行。

sentences.english: It was the American people's first real taste of the bloodiness of modern warfare.
sentences.chinese: 這是美國人民第一次真正的現代戰爭的血腥的味道。

sentences.english: What's your best recipe for a great Bloody Mary?
sentences.chinese: 你自己最好的血腥瑪麗配方是什麼呢？

sentences.english: Timur was an even bloodier conqueror than Genghis had been.
sentences.chinese: 鐵木爾是一位甚至比成吉思汗更爲血腥的征服者。

sentences.english: It was blood the Meereenese yearned to see, not skill.
sentences.chinese: 彌林人渴望能看到血腥而非技藝。

definition: flesh and blood flying (idiom); carnage/people blown to pieces
